channel.title: Noclip code help please!

item.title: Noclip code help please!
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“noclip”)) {
if (playerRights => 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“beatz”)) {

    } else {
            c.sendMessage("You're a retard if you think you can do this..");
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (c.playerName +" tried to noclip, what a retarded dumb shit.");
    }

}[/code]

    } else { 
            sendMessage("You're a retard if you think you can do this..");
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" tried to noclip, what a retarded dumb shit.");

item.title: Noclip code help please!
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights => 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("beatz")) { sendMessage("You're a retard if you think you can do this.."); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to noclip what a retarded dumb shit."); }
^^ think that would work, also please dont double post.

item.title: Noclip code help please!
item.dc:creator: @santa_p_hat santa p hat
item.description:
@santa_p_hat wrote:

Okay, i made this noclip code and would like to know what is wrong with it

if (playerRights => 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("beatz")) {
command.startsWith("noclip"); {
  } else if (playerRights <= 2) { 
  sendMessage("You're a retard if you think you can do this..");
  PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
	  + " tried to noclip what a retarded dumb shit.");
    }
}

Now the noclip part works how it only works for owner and Beatz but where it say you’re a retard and stuff it does not work… :S If anyone could help thanks.

Read full topic
